lead_paragraph: Insurgents seized one of the last Syrian government positions in the northern province of Idlib on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Insurgent Coalition Pushes Assad’s Forces From a Stronghold
headline.main: Syria: Insurgent Coalition Pushes Assad’s Forces From a Stronghold

snippet: Insurgents seized one of the last Syrian government positions in the northern province of Idlib on Thursday night.
abstract: Insurgents in Syria seize last government-held position in northern province Idlib, latest in series of gains by newly effective opposition coalition.
